required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: IMPEDE and IMPEDE-FX Embolization Plug Registry
clinical_study.official_title: Post Market Registry of the IMPEDE and IMPEDE-FX Embolization Plugs

brief_summary.textblock: EMBO-PMS is a prospective, multicentre, registry study of the IMPEDE and IMPEDE-FX Embolization Plug Systems

primary_outcome.measure: Safety - Rate of freedom from serious adverse events
primary_outcome.description: Rate of freedom from serious adverse events related to the study devices and/or procedure, per review and adjudication by medical monitor

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy - Rate of technical success (embolization of target vessel)
primary_outcome.description: Technical success, defined as embolization of the target area after deployment of the study device

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy - Rate of recurrence of clinical symptoms, based on original complaint
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants free of recurrent clinical symptoms, based on clinical symptoms of original complaint

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy - Rate of treated vessel occlusion
secondary_outcome.description: Treated vessel occlusion, measured per study site standard of care for the original condition treated

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety - Rate of freedom from serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of freedom from serious adverse events related to the study devices and/or procedure, per review and adjudication by medical monitor

study_pop.textblock: Adult study participants considered candidates for a peripheral vascular embolization procedure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Study participant is â‰¥18 years of age
- Study participant is considered a candidate for arterial or venous embolization of the peripheral vasculature
Exclusion Criteria:
- Study participant has an inability to provide written informed consent
- Study participant/treatment outside of the approved study device labeling, instructions for use (IFU)
- Study participant is a prisoner or member of other vulnerable population

overall_official.affiliation: Charing Cross Hospital (Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust)

facility.name: St George's Hospital (St George's University Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust)
St Mary's Hospital (Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust)
